name: resume & cover letter template \ karngyan.com
description:
I know some people enjoy spending time on their resume and cover letters, this is for them.


A neat figma template to put their data in and share to the world.


Happy Job Hunting :)


Upates:

  • Dark themed resume.
  • The export to PDF might be as big as 3-4 MB. Please use a PDF compressor service like https://www.ilovepdf.com/compress_pdf
  • It should reduce that to less than a MB.
